name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance application development in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **PHP** frameworks such as **Symfony** and **Laravel**, alongside **Go**, with proficiency in database management using **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**. Strong background in implementing **microservices** and **REST APIs**, utilizing design patterns, the **12-Factor App methodology**, and **Clean Architecture** principles. Skilled in CI/CD processes and containerization with **Docker**, as well as orchestration using **Kubernetes** and **Helm**. Familiar with messaging systems including **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **Amazon SQS** for real-time data processing.

In addition to backend expertise, I possess valuable experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for full-stack solutions. Well-versed in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, and I have a solid background in MLOps utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
